name: gemini-watermark-cleaner
description: An intelligent browser extension designed specifically for Google Gemini that automatically detects and removes watermarks from downloaded images
author: Suryanand - suryanand.com

scripts.build: echo 'Extension is already built. No build step required for vanilla JS extension.'
scripts.validate: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json')); console.log('âœ“ Manifest valid:', m.name, m.version);"
